column2: - **InAppNotification:** The InAppNotification control offers the ability to show local notifications in your application - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1343)) - [documentation](http://www.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/controls/InAppNotification)

- **TextToolbar:** Control for editing RichText or Markdown - [William Bradley](https://github.com/WilliamABradley) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1116)) - [documentation](http://www.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/controls/TextToolbar/)
- **Expander:** added ability to change expand direction/orientation - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1336))
- **Menu:** - [Ibraheem Osama](https://github.com/IbraheemOsama) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1285))

column3: - Added support for underline character in MenuItem by using '^'
- Flyout is now positioned correctly when menu item is at the edge,
- Animations are now consistent when hovering over menu items
- MenuItem now supports content instead of just string
- MenuItems can now wrap around safely
- MenuItem and Menu now respond to font styling

column2: - **LogicalTreeExtensions** to navigate actual control structure - [Michael Hawker](https://github.com/michael-hawker) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1390))

- Created .NET Standard libraries for **Microsoft.Toolkit** and **Microsoft.Toolkit.Services** in preparation to move more APIs cross platform. Moved the Bing Service to Microsoft.Toolkit.Services - [Chris Barker](https://github.com/cbarkerms) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1348))

- Add new package **Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Connectivity** to unify connectivity APIs including BluetoothLEHelper and Network helpers - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1382))
- **ScreenUnitHelper:** to assist in converting between various units - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1250))
- New shell design and navigation model - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1402))
- New live XAML editor to edit samples in app - [Michael Hawker](https://github.com/michael-hawker) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1402))
- Enabled offline documentation - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1428))
- New landing page experience including most recent and what's new list - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1402))
- Easier Xbox navigation - [Shane Weaver](https://github.com/shweaver-MSFT) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1429))
- All projects target Creators Update - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1377))

- **Menu:** Fixed menu showing on hover and on requesting menu from keyboard when IsEnabled=true  - [Ibraheem Osama](https://github.com/IbraheemOsama) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1439))
- **ScrollHeader:** Enabled x:Bind on TargetListViewBase - [Michael Hawker](https://github.com/michael-hawker) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1427))
- **DropShadowPanel** and **RadialGauge** now work in the VS designer - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1413))

- **CarouselControl** now does not throw exception when ItemsSource is changed to NULL or a smaller collection, or when SelectedIndex < 0  - [gaunts](https://github.com/gaunts) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1408))
- **HeaderedTextBox** Visual State Orientation is set to Initial Orientation - [Michael Hawker](https://github.com/michael-hawker) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1386))
- **AdaptiveGridView** now supports custom ItemsPanel with margin and padding - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1345))
- **RoundImageEx** Now has default horizontal and vertical alignment value. - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1374))
- **MarkdownTextBlock** now supports SIP Schema - [BenAffleckIsBatman](https://github.com/BenAffleckIsBatman) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1347))
- Fixes to **Facebook** service following FB graph changes in v2.9 - [Chris Barker](https://github.com/cbarkerms) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1322))
- **MicrosoftGraph** service can now retrieve calendar events. - [Guillaume DEMICHELI](https://github.com/CarteKiwi) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1220))

- **CacheBase** stream initialization rework to improve speed and prevent artefacts on image - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1435))
- **ImageCache** marked _instance field as ThreadStatic to resolve threading issue - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1444))
- Re-enabled toast **AfterActivationBehavior** - [Andrew Bares](https://github.com/anbare) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1355))
- Fixed all broken links and mistakes - [Vijay Nirmal](https://github.com/Vijay-Nirmal) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1354))
- Added ExpressionBuilder documentation - [Vijay Nirmal](https://github.com/Vijay-Nirmal) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1366))
- Listed all converters and added examples of converter scenarios - [Michael Hawker](https://github.com/michael-hawker) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1395))
- Fixes for canceling printing and property bindings - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1392))
- Removed all .AsTask().ConfigureAwait(false) calls - [Pedro Lamas](https://github.com/PedroLamas) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1327))
- Removed HttpHelper using in all APIs and replaced with System.Net.HttpClient - [Scotty Le](https://github.com/Code-ScottLe) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1381))
- Updated to latest sign client for singing packages - [Oren Novotny](https://github.com/onovotny) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1442))
- Removed all project.json - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1398))
- added NETCORE dependency to nuget packages - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1394))

- Extensions and several controls have moved to the **Microsoft.Toolkit.UWP.UI.Extensions** namespace - [Edwin van Driel](https://github.com/edwinvandriel) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1297)):
- All helpers have moved to the **Microsoft.Toolkit.UWP.Helpers** namespace - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1396))
- WrapPanel has moved to the Microsoft.Toolkit.UWP.UI.Controls namespace - [Edwin van Driel](https://github.com/edwinvandriel) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1297))

- Moved BluetoothLEHelper, NetworkHelper, and ConnectionInformation to the Microsoft.Toolkit.UWP.Connectivity package - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1382))
- Deprecated HttpHelper and moved to .NET standard HttpClient - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1326))

- Deprecated several fields for creating new posts to Facebook following FB graph changes in v2.9 - [cbarkerms](https://github.com/cbarkerms) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1322))
- Removed deprecated APIs - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1396))

column1:
,https://api.github.com/users/nmetulev,711864,nmetulev,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/7538421/assets,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/7538421,master,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/tarball/v2.0.0,https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/tag/v2.0.0,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/zipball/v2.0.0,v2.0.0,False,False
7050324,2017-07-17T18:39:16Z,2017-07-17T18:39:53Z,v1.5.1,This release addresses the breaking change in 1.5 with the HamburgerMenu. The default templates for the HamburgerMenuItems have been removed until we can re-introduce them without breaking changes. See #1277 for more info
In addition, the following bug fixes have been added to this release:
- Menu: changed MenuItem Header to type object - ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1294))
-  Crash in getter HamburgerMenu.OpenPaneLength with default value - [Dmitry Ponomarenko](https://github.com/snrnats) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1314))

- DropShadowPanel Content wireup size changed - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1307))",https://api.github.com/users/nmetulev,711864,nmetulev,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/7050324/assets,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/7050324,master,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/tarball/v1.5.1,https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/tag/v1.5.1,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/zipball/v1.5.1,v1.5.1,False,False

- **Menu**: The Menu Control defines a menu of choices for users to invoke - [Ibraheem Osama](https://github.com/IbraheemOsama) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1086)) [documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/Menu/)

- **OrbitView**: New control inherited from ItemsControl. All items are arranged in circle around a center element - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1160)) [documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/OrbitView/)

- **RadialProgressBar**: a XAML Control that displays a value within a particular range using a circular sector - [Alberto Fustinoni](https://github.com/albertofustinoni) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/828)) - [documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/RadialProgressBar/)

- **RoundImageEx**: Created RoundImageEx, Moved ImageEx Core Logic to Base Class - [William Bradley](https://github.com/WilliamABradley) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1100)) - [documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/ImageEx/)

- PullToRefreshListView: added Event and Command to handle canceled intent to refresh - [Rafael Pedretti](https://github.com/rpedretti) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1047)) - [documentation](http://www.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/PullToRefreshListview/)

- **ExpressionBuilder**: A type-safe way to build powerful composition ExpressionAnimations - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1245)) - [documentation](http://www.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/animations/Expressions/)

- **BluetoothLEHelper**: helper that provides functionality to easily enumerate, connect to and interact with Bluetooth LE Peripherals - [Steffen Froehlich](https://github.com/drache42) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1245)) - [documentation](http://www.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/helpers/BluetoothLEHelper/)

- ListViewBaseExtensions: added **AlternateRowColor** and **AlternateRowItemTemplate** property - [Edwin van Driel](https://github.com/edwinvandriel) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1101)) - [documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/helpers/ListViewBaseExtensions/)

- ListViewBaseExtensions: added Vertical and horizontal container stretch - [Edwin van Driel](https://github.com/edwinvandriel) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1130)) - [documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/helpers/ListViewBaseExtensions/)
- MicrosoftTranslator: Added method to get translation language names - [Marco Minerva](https://github.com/marcominerva) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1148))
- Ensured VS2017 build tools are used - [Pedro Lamas](https://github.com/PedroLamas) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1252))
- Fixed toast displayTimestamp from including too many decimals - [Andrew Bares](https://github.com/anbare) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1075))
- Added ImageUri to ToastSnooze/ToastDismiss buttons - [Andrew Bares](https://github.com/anbare) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1155))
- DropShadowPanel: Fixed the Drop shadow alignment - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1076))
- MarkdownTextBlock: Fixed bug with closing parenthesis inside urls - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1099))
- MarkdownTextblock: fixed issue in image not returning the correct ending position - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1189))
- MarkdownTextBlock: added native strikethrough when running on Creators Update - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1235))

- RangeSelector: Added tap handler for rangeselector and moveed the closest thumb to position - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1089))

- AdaptiveGridView: Removed AdaptiveGridView padding from width for layout calculation - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1135))
- MasterDetailsView: Only show back button when changing from collapsed details view - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/941))

- MasterDetailsView: Always set _detailsPresenter.Content even if SelectedItem is null - [Matt Munich](https://github.com/mattmunich) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1199))
- ScrollHeader: Hide ScrollHeaders vertical scrollbar - [Patrick Dehne](https://github.com/pdehne) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1169))
- RoundImageEx: Use Rectangle instead of Border - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1181))
- ImageEx: Changed IsCachedEnabled property into a dependency property - [Mohammed Adenwala](https://github.com/madenwala) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1124))
- GridSplitter: Made IsTabStop work and simplify control's visual tree - [Lukas Fellechner](https://github.com/lukasf) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1145))

- GridSplitter: Fixed GridSplitter behavior when using MaxWidth on ColumnDefinition - [Geert van Horrik](https://github.com/GeertvanHorrik) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1157))

- RegexTextbox: Changing max RegexTextbox Email Validation from 3 Character domain name to unlimited - [AVK](https://github.com/avknaidu) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1192))
- TextBoxMask: Setting text in code TextBox.Text - [Ibraheem Osama](https://github.com/IbraheemOsama) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1216))
- DropShadowPanel, ImageEx: DropShadow support for ImageEx and RoundImageEx - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1183))
- SlidableListItem: Makes sure ContentGrid_ManipulationCompleted does nothing if swiping - [pekspro](https://github.com/pekspro) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1213))
- HamburgerMenu: Use page defined item templates - [Bart Lannoeye](https://github.com/bartlannoeye) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1222))
- HamburgerMenu: Added HamburgerMenu.PaneForeground to address theming problem - [Karl Erickson](https://github.com/KarlErickson) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1186))
- HamburgerMenu: Updated style to match NavigationView - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1239))
- ScrollHeader: Removed tabstop from ScrollHeader - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1234))
- Carousel: Fixed ItemDepth, Auto sizing and SelectionChanged event - [Sébastien Pertus](https://github.com/Mimetis) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1139))
- BladeView: Change BladeItem to be an Expander - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1248))
- QuickReturnHeaderBehavior: Improved expression animation to allow smooth scrolling - [Lukas Fellechner](https://github.com/lukasf) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1196))

- ConnectionInformation: Ensured that the connection profile has one or more network names - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1114))
- Removed dependency object as parameter on attached properties - [Edwin van Driel](https://github.com/edwinvandriel) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1144))
- ObjectStorage: Settings value persistence simplification - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1077))
- AdvancedCollectionView: Fixed issue where Compare ignored inherited properties - [gitasaurus](https://github.com/gitasaurus) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1211))
- Fix use of search in the sample page - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1118))
- navigate to sample page if user choose suggestion in search bar - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1269))
- Expander: set Background to the entire control - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1119))
- HamburgerMenuGlyphItem now has a default style and ItemTemplates are no longer necessary - [PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1239)

-  Added HamburgerMenu.PaneForeground to address theming problem - [PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1186)",https://api.github.com/users/nmetulev,711864,nmetulev,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/6930936/assets,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/6930936,master,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/tarball/1.5.0,https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/releases/tag/1.5.0,https://api.github.com/repos/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/zipball/1.5.0,1.5.0,False,False

- **All controls** are now aligned to our quality min bar - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/950) - [Documentation](https://www.eternalcoding.com/?p=2792))

- Introduced **Developer Tools** which are controls for helping developers creating applications. This release includes a **FocusTracker** (used to display information about the current focused XAML element) and an **AlignmentGrid** (used to display a grid to help aligning controls)  - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1018) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/developer%20tools/FocusTracker/) and [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/developer%20tools/AlignmentGrid/))

- **ImageEx**: Added DecodePixelHeight, DecodePixelType and DecodePixelWidth properties - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/931) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/ImageEx/))

- Added new features to **MarkdownTextBlock**: Github code style, images and link foreground color - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/958) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/MarkdownTextBlock/))

- **MasterDetailsView**: Added a CommandBar for the master and details section - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1028) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/controls/MasterDetailsView/))

- **NetworkHelper**: Provides functionality to monitor changes in network connection and allows users to query for network information without additional lookups - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/984) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/helpers/NetworkHelper/))

- **ViewExtensions**: TitleBar and StatusBar can now be controlled from XAML - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/1002) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/helpers/ViewExtensions/))

- Added support for **Twitter** streaming API - [Guillaume Demicheli](https://github.com/CarteKiwi) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/999) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/services/Twitter/))
- BladeView: Fixed scrolling issue when used with data biding - [Dong Xie](https://github.com/xied75)
- Expander: Added template binding for Background property - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno)
- HamburgerMenu: Fixed scroll behavior for HamburgerMenu - [Alex Kuchta](https://github.com/amkuchta)
- ScrollHeader: Made TargetListViewBase actually return a ListViewBase - [Patrick Dehne](https://github.com/pdehne)
- MarkdownTextBlock: Added foreground colors for header 1 through 6 - [Daniel Häfele](https://github.com/haefele)
- DropShadowPanel: Fixed an unhandled exception - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- AdaptiveGridView: Fixed an issue with scrollbars - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fixed a bug occurring when attaching behaviors - [Patrick Dehne](https://github.com/pdehne)
- Introduce BehaviorBase and let all behaviors derive from this base - [Geert van Horrik](https://github.com/GeertvanHorrik)
- AdvancedCollectionView: Fixed a small bug when inserting items - [Dong Xie](https://github.com/xied75)
- Cache: Added a check if item exists in the in-memory storage - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- Cache: Improved CacheBase / InMemory Storage concurrency - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- PrintHelper: Fixed OnPreviewpagesCreated bug with orientation changes - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fixed ColorHelper HSL and HSV calculations - [Derek Guenther](https://github.com/dguenther)
- OneDrive: Added support for OrderBy ascending and descending size - [Eric Leigh](https://github.com/ericleigh007)
- OneDrive: Added background download support - [Tomasz Romaszkiewicz](https://github.com/Romasz)
- Twitter: Added missing properties (picture and urls) - [Guillaume Demicheli](https://github.com/CarteKiwi)
- TranslatorService: Added TranslatorServiceException and better documentation - [Marco Minerva](https://github.com/marcominerva)
- Added a search box to search samples directly from the menu bar - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fixed a bug where Sample app did not adjust to fit items when tablet orientation changed - [liakamp](https://github.com/liakamp)
- Fixed push toast notification in background task (in single process mode) - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno)
- Fixed hamburger selected item not synced when using back button in sample app - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Added copy button to code samples - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)

- Added support for composite values in **BaseObjectStorageHelper** - [Cabuxa.Mapache](https://github.com/CabuxaMapache) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/585) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/helpers/ObjectStorage/))

- Added **Latitude and Longitude** support for TwitterService if available - [Parker Smart](https://github.com/SpilledMilkCOM) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/735) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/dev/services/Twitter/))

- New **toast** features for Creators Update - [Andrew Bares](https://github.com/anbare) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/713) - [Documentation](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/tiles_and_toasts/))
- Fixed tab navigation for HamburgerMenu and MasterDetailsView - [Taylor Southwick](https://github.com/twsouthwick)
- Applied accessibility min bar to SlidableListItem - [Audrey Petit](https://github.com/AudreyPetit)
- Improved cache support for ImageEx - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- Allowed for two-way binding in HamburgerMenu - [Scott Lovegrove](https://github.com/ScottIsAFool)
- Fixed binding to SelectedItem on HamburgerMenu - [Scott Lovegrove](https://github.com/ScottIsAFool)
- Changed MasterDetailsView to use storyboard animation - [Huang, Zhaoquan](https://github.com/taoyouh)
- Added support for DataTemplateSelectors to MasterDetailsView - [Scott Lovegrove](https://github.com/ScottIsAFool)
- Fixed issue with the MasterDetailsView not handling navigating back when unable to control via the BackRequested event - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- Fixed design mode issues with MasterDetailsView - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- Added support for full screen blades to BladeControl - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno)
- RadialGauge now accepts any MinAngle - MaxAngle range - [Diederik Krols](https://github.com/XamlBrewer)
- Fixed layout issue with AdaptiveGridView - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fixed horizontal alignment of the GridViewItems in AdaptiveGridView - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- Fixed wrong cast to string in PullToRefreshListView.ReleaseToRefreshContent - [Michael Mairegger](https://github.com/xxMUROxx)
- Fixed header issues with PullToRefreshListView - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev)
- Added a way to modify the Easing Function used in animations - [hig-ag](https://github.com/hig-ag)
- Added filename validation in Storage Helper - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno)
- CancellationToken support to ImageCache PreCacheAsync - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- Simplified PrintHelper usage when container already contains controls - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- HttpHelper now exposes default constructor - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- IncrementalLoadingCollection now instantiates source using Activator.CreateInstance - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- Added Incremental Loading support for BingService - [Marco Minerva](https://github.com/marcominerva)
- Added documentation to every sample - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Added POCO code sample for MasterDetailsView - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Added a new section to gather useful links and tools for UWP developers - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Added Anniversary Update and Creators Update badges - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno)
- DropShadowPanel is now a templated control - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- DropShadowPanel was implemented as a user control which prevented users to change its template
- Fixed mouse issues with PullToRefreshListView - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev)
- Changed default behavior to be false for mouse

- Many improvements were done for **ImageEx** controls including bug fixes and better cache support - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/449) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/controls/ImageEx/))

- Expose HeaderTemplate and HeaderContent for **HeaderedTextBlock** - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/489) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/controls/headeredTextblock/))

- Added MaintainAspectRatio and optimized item width calculation for **AdaptiveGridView** - [Lukas Fellechner](https://github.com/lukasf) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/521) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/controls/AdaptiveGridView/))

- Added PullToRefreshContent, ReleaseToRefreshContent properties to **PullToRefreshListView** - [Michael Mairegger](https://github.com/xxMUROxx) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/539) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/controls/PullToRefreshListview/))

- Added **HttpHelper** with support for connection pooling - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/499) - [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/helpers/HttpHelper/))

- Add the ability to specifiy additional paramenters when requesting items to **IncrementalLoadingCollection** - [Marco Minerva](https://github.com/marcominerva) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/514) -  [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/helpers/IncrementalLoadingCollection/))

- Enabled paging support for **Facebook Service** requests - [Chris Barker](https://github.com/cbarkerms) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/533) -  [Documentation](http://docs.uwpcommunitytoolkit.com/en/master/services/Facebook/))
- Add an exception to prevent users to directly use Items and OptionsItems for HamburgerMenu - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fixing GridSplitter Sibling Row issue and min width/height issue - [Ibraheem Osama](https://github.com/IbraheemOsama)
- Allow AdaptiveGridView to be used without setting ItemHeight, ItemWidth, or DesiredWidth properties - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- Fix a bug with selectedItem when the HamburgerMenu was not yet templated - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fix unhandled error with one row mode in AdaptiveGridView - [Andrii](https://github.com/andriikrupka)
- Fixed logic error in Blur animation - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev)
- Added a check to determine if key exists in BaseObjectStorageHelper.Save method - [Cabuxa Mapache](https://github.com/CabuxaMapache)
- Removed TSource default constructor requirement for IncrementalLoadingCollection - [Hermit Dave](https://github.com/hermitdave)
- Added support for Xbox for MicrosoftGraph service - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Move all notifications projects to a _notifications_ folder - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Samples are not sorted by name - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- AdaptiveGridView now inherits from GridView - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- Previous version of AdaptiveGridView was inheriting from Control. new version will now have all the features of a GridView out of the box
- BladeControl was renamed to BladeView to align with SDK standard naming - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- Previous classes (BladeControl and BladeItem) are still available but flagged as obsolete.
- BladeOpened and BladeClosed are no more static - [Shawn Kendrot](https://github.com/skendrot)
- You should now be able to subscribe to the event from within xaml and the event should not be static across all BladeViews

- Added StepSize and IsInteractive to **RadialGauge** - [Diederik Krols](https://github.com/XamlBrewer) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/252) - [Documentation](http://uwpcommunitytoolkit.readthedocs.io/en/master/controls/RadialGauge))

- **HamburgerMenu** updates - Made it simpler to use from scratch - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/264) - [Documentation](http://uwpcommunitytoolkit.readthedocs.io/en/master/controls/HamburgerMenu))

- Improved converters and introducing **generic converter** - [Nathanael Marchand](https://github.com/NatMarchand) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/164) - [Documentation](http://uwpcommunitytoolkit.readthedocs.io/en/master/helpers/Converters/))

- **In-memory layer** of caching in ImageCache - [Jure Purgar](https://github.com/jurepurgar) ([PR #1](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/242) - [PR#2](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/275) -  [Documentation](http://uwpcommunitytoolkit.readthedocs.io/en/master/helpers/ImageCache/))

- Local and Roaming **Object Storage** helper - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/298) - [Documentation](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp-community-toolkit/helpers/storageservice))

- Added a parameter in BingSearchConfig to get results from **BingNews**. Also added support for languages - [Philippe Matray](https://github.com/phmatray) ([PR#1](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/190) - [PR#2](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/283) - [Documentation](http://uwpcommunitytoolkit.readthedocs.io/en/master/services/Bing/))

- **Facebook** service can now retrieve albums and photos - [Chris Barker](https://github.com/cbarkerms) ([PR](https://github.com/Microsoft/UWPCommunityToolkit/pull/307) - [Documentation](http://uwpcommunitytoolkit.readthedocs.io/en/master/services/Facebook))
- Documentation is now part of the same repo as the source code - [Jason Short](https://github.com/jasonshortphd)
- Adding keyboard only support for HamburgerMenu and RangeSelector - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Use C#6 nameof() instead of hard-coded strings - [Thomas Nigro](https://github.com/ThomasNigro)
- A small casing fix of readme.md - [Eldar Dordzhiev](https://github.com/eadordzhiev)
- RotationDelay dependency property is implemented for customizing tile rotation delay - [Burak Kaan Köse](https://github.com/bkaankose)
- HeaderedTextBlock: if Text is empty, hide its TextBlock - [Thomas Nigro](https://github.com/ThomasNigro)
- ImageEx was going incorrectly to Loaded state before image is downloaded - [Scott Lovegrove](https://github.com/ScottIsAFool)
- Allow VerticalScrollMode and VerticalScrollBarVisibility to be set on AdaptiveGridView - [Burak Kaan Köse](https://github.com/bkaankose)
- More flexible ImageEx source (Uri) parsing - [Andrej Tozon](https://github.com/andrejt)
- Fix blur animation auto start - [Etienne Margraff](https://github.com/meulta)
- Added null-conditional check for Offset.StartAnimation() - [Julian Oster](https://github.com/jlnostr)
- Use WwwFormUrlDecoder to get uri query - [h82258652](https://github.com/h82258652)
- Service constructors are no longer private - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- BingDataProvider now check for CurrentCulture before search - [Burak Kaan Köse](https://github.com/bkaankose)
- Added a function to retrieve a single facebook photo - [Max](https://github.com/assassin316)
- Added Enable Cache setting to ImageEx control sample - [Andrej Tozon](https://github.com/andrejt)
- Fixed rotation bugs in sample app - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fix designer crash when using Gauge control - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Reduced file size of images (lossless) for sample app - [ThisWillDoIt](https://github.com/ThisWillDoIt)
- Hide Properties tab in sample app when there is no property to display - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Reduced hamburgerMenu itemsSource content to clearly show separation with options - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Fixed a crash of sample app due to dataContextChanged called multiple times - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Added JS code tab for sample app - [David Catuhe](https://github.com/deltakosh)
- Added JS code sample for Notifications - [David Bottiau](https://github.com/Odonno)
- ScrollViewer support for property grid in sample app - [Burak Kaan Köse](https://github.com/bkaankose)
- With v1.0 animation behaviours have translation offsets of 1, rotation angle of 1, and blur radius of 1 by default. This changes them all to be 0 which most users would expect.
- This property was not used by the control
- Fixed Stop() behavior when not using UseComposition - [Nikola Metulev](https://github.com/nmetulev)
- Stop() was doing a reset of the state when not using composition. Now Storyboards and Composition behaviors are aligned.
